item.title: Professional Development
item.description: CS50 | 1 Module Left A MOOC course offered by Harvard University it’s an introductory course to computer science. It stats off teaching scratch and giving you the basics of what programming languages are like. It start to move towards C and gives you an in-depth explanations of basic algorithms and tools to measure how effectives algorithms in certain scenarios like Big O notation. It also dives deep into memory management the memory stack, heap, buffer overflows, and pointers.
